title: Morphodynamic study of hematopoietic stem cell emergence using shape matching methods with mechanical constraints
abstract: We developed geometry-aware methods for analyzing biological membrane morphology during hematopoietic stem cell emergence. Our approach integrates Helfrich energy constraints into shape-matching frameworks to quantify curvature dynamics in developmental processes.

title: not-MIWAE and a supervised MNAR extension
abstract: We extend the MIWAE framework for missing-not-at-random data imputation by incorporating supervised learning for censored observations. Our method leverages variational inference to handle complex missingness patterns in high-dimensional datasets.
